children.desc: Grants access to a server shell that has a very high capacity for components.

children.desc: Organized record databases and how they're used.

children.desc: Allows seeing in the dark without actual light!

children.desc: Study into networks of processing units that mimic our brains.

children.desc: Application of Bluespace for static teleportation technology.

children.desc: Research the technology required to create and use basic shuttles.

children.desc: Research into voidspace tunnelling, allowing us to significantly reduce flight times.

children.desc: Unlock the potential of the mysterious anomalies that appear on station.

children.name: Miniaturized Bluespace Research
children.desc: Extreme reduction in space required for bluespace engines, leading to portable bluespace technology.

children.desc: Portable bluespace technology allows the production of backpacks that can store a greater volume of items than the volume of the bag.

children.name: Bluespace Wormhole Projector
children.desc: Develop the research required to create a miniaturized bluespace wormhole projector, allowing you to jump between two places instantly.

children.name: Quantum Spin Inverter
children.desc: Research the ability to create an experimental device that is able to swap the locations of two entities by switching their particles' spin values. Must be linked to another device to function.
